screen_desc: The screenshot shows a calendar app displaying the month of November. It lists various events and holidays, such as "First Day of American Indian Heritage Month" on the 1st, "Daylight Saving Time ends" on the 6th, "Election Day" on the 8th, "Veterans Day" on the 11th, "Thanksgiving Day" on the 24th, and "Native American Heritage Day" on the 25th. The bottom of the screen transitions to December 2022.
